europeana:record.dc:title: Cherax (Astaconephrops) boesemani, a new species of crayfish (Crustacea: Decapoda: Parastacidae) from the centre of the Vogelkop Peninsula in Irian Jaya (West New Guinea), Indonesia
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Lukhaup C.
Pekny R.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Arthropoda
Crustacea
Decapoda, Parastacidae
Cherax (Astaconephrops) boesemani
new species
freshwater crayfish
Ajamaru, Irian Jaya
Indonesia
West New Guinea
europeana:record.dc:description: A new species, Cherax (Astaconephrops) boesemani spec. nov., from the Amajaru Lakes, in the Kais River Drainage in the centre of the Vogelkop Peninsula, West Irian Jaya, Indonesia, is described, figured and compared with related species.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Cherax (Astaconephrops) boesemani, a new species of crayfish (Crustacea: Decapoda: Parastacidae) from the centre of the Vogelkop Peninsula in Irian Jaya (West New Guinea), Indonesia (URN:ISSN:00240672) (Volume 82) (Issue 33)
